short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send website contents and events to your Korgi boards and calendars in one click (requires a Korgi Plus subscription)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Korgi Clipper to send content and events from any website to your Korgi boards or calendar. (Requires Korgi Plus subscription or higher.)

Korgi is a home base for your work and life, uniting your content, tasks, and tools in a single, shareable board — using your own Google Workspace™ and Microsoft 365™ apps and drives, plus our AI assistant.

With Korgi Clipper, open any website to capture the title, URL, and any highlighted text on the page. Select the Korgi board and column you want to add a card to, or add the site's link to an existing card. You can even add events straight to your calendar and your boards, from any page.

It’s the easy way to instantly turn research, bookmark, deadlines, and brainstorms into cards and tasks on your boards, with one click.

EXPLANATION OF DATA USAGE:
Personally identifiable information: Korgi Clipper extensions sign in with Google, as with the Korgi app.
Website content: Korgi sends and saves site links and site content users highlight to their Google Sheets. Korgi sends calendar events users create to their Google Calendar.
